TEXT.English: For now, regulars are greatly satisfied with the wine .[NEWLINE]Some sailors come in our ports to relax in the tavern.
TEXT.French: Pour l'instant, les habitués sont très satifait du vins qu'on leur propose.[NEWLINE]Certains marins s'arrentent dans nos port pour se détendre dans nos tavernes.

TEXT.German: Please no longer gives me this message.
TEXT.Italian: Please no longer gives me this message.
TEXT.Spanish: Please no longer gives me this message.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have just established the Palace of the Congress!!
TEXT.French: Félicitations, vous venez de constituer le Palais du Congrès !!
TEXT.German: Congratulations, you have just established the Palace of the Congress !!
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni, avete appena costituito il Palazzo del Congresso!!
TEXT.Spanish: Felicitaciones, Usted acaba de constituir el Palacio del Congreso!!

TEXT.English: This represents a crucial stage towards your independence.[NEWLINE]Without seperating you from the influence of your King, the Assembly of the Congress acts as a capital which will grant you a number of benefits.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]You can henceforth constuct the military unit "Patriots".[NEWLINE]All your military units obtain the patriotic promotion.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: Ceci représente une étape cruciale vers votre indépendance.[NEWLINE]Sans pour autant vous détacher de l'emprise de votre Roi, la constitution du Congrès agit comme une capitale qui vous apportera un certain nombre de bénéfices.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vous pouvez désormais constituer des unités militaires "Patriotes".[NEWLINE]Toutes vos unités militaires obtiennent une promotion patriotique.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: This represents a crucial stage towards your independence.[NEWLINE]Without seperating you from the influence of your King, the Assembly of the Congress acts as a capital which will grant you a number of benefits.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]You can henceforth constuct the military unit "Patriots".[NEWLINE]All your military units obtain the patriotic promotion.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: Questo rappresenta una tappa cruciale verso la vostra indipendenza.[NEWLINE]Senza vi staccarvi dell'ascendente del vostro Re, la costituzione del Congresso agisce come una capitale che vi porterà un certo numero di benefici.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Potete costituire ormai delle unità militari "Patriota."[NEWLINE]Tutte le vostre unità militari ottengono una promozione patriottica.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: This represents a crucial stage towards your independence.[NEWLINE]Without seperating you from the influence of your King, the Assembly of the Congress acts as a capital which will grant you a number of benefits.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]You can henceforth constuct the military unit "Patriots".[NEWLINE]All your military units obtain the patriotic promotion.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: You have constructed your first hospital in your colonies.
TEXT.French: Vous venez de fonder votre premier hôpital dans vos colonies.
TEXT.German: You have constructed your first hospital in your colonies.
TEXT.Italian: Avete costruito il vostro primo ospedale nelle vostre colonie.
TEXT.Spanish: You have constructed your first hospital in your colonies.

TEXT.English: You can now access the screen "hospital management" to increase the care of military units and the birthrate in your colony.[NEWLINE]You have 50 cloth in your "Central Stock" for the proper functioning of the hospital. As the number of hospitals increases in your colonies this stock will increase.[NEWLINE]The allocation of cloth can be changed at anytime.
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez désormais accéder à un écran de contrôle "Gestion des Hôpitaux" afin d'augmenter les soins des unités militaires et le taux de natalité dans votre colonie.[NEWLINE]Vous possédez 50 unités de tissus dans votre "Stock Central" pour la bonne marche de l'hôpital. Ce stock augmentera en fonction du nombre d'hôpitaux dans vos colonies.[NEWLINE]L'allocation de ces tissus est paramétrable et modifiable à tout moment.
TEXT.German: You can now access a screen control "hospital management" to increase the care of military units and the birthrate in your colony.[NEWLINE]You have 50 cloth in your "Central Stock" for the proper functioning of the hospital. As the number of hospitals increases in your colonies this stock will increase.[NEWLINE]The allocation of cloth can be changed at anytime.
TEXT.Italian: Ormai potete accedere ad un schermo di controllo "Gestione degli Ospedali" per aumentare le possibilità di cure delle unità militari e di natalità nella vostra colonia.[NEWLINE]Possedete 50 unità di tessuti nella vostra "Stock Centrale" per il buono funzionamento dell'ospedale.[NEWLINE]L'assegnazione di questi tessuti possono essere regolati e modificati in ogni momento.
TEXT.Spanish: You can now access a screen control "hospital management" to increase the care of military units and the birthrate in your colony.[NEWLINE]You have 50 cloth in your "Central Stock" for the proper functioning of the hospital. As the number of hospitals increases in your colonies this stock will increase.[NEWLINE]The allocation of cloth can be changed at anytime.

TEXT.English: You have constructed your first dry dock in your colonies.
TEXT.French: Vous venez de fonder votre première cale sèche dans vos colonies.
TEXT.German: You have constructed your first dry dock in your colonies.
TEXT.Italian: Avete costruito il vostro primo bacino di carenaggio nelle vostre colonie.
TEXT.Spanish: You have constructed your first dry dock in your colonies.

TEXT.English: The completion of a dry dock will greatly increase the repair rate of your damaged ships. [NEWLINE] This is an important strategic choice that can make the difference against the other European players.
TEXT.French: La réalisation d'une cale-sèche vous permettra d'augmenter considérablement la réparations de vos navires abimés.[NEWLINE]C'est un choix stratégique important qui pourra faire la différence face aux autres joueurs européens.
TEXT.German: The completion of a dry dock will greatly increase the repair rate of your damaged ships. [NEWLINE] This is an important strategic choice that can make the difference against the other European players.
TEXT.Italian: The completion of a dry dock will greatly increase the repair rate of your damaged ships. [NEWLINE] This is an important strategic choice that can make the difference against the other European players.
TEXT.Spanish: The completion of a dry dock will greatly increase the repair rate of your damaged ships. [NEWLINE] This is an important strategic choice that can make the difference against the other European players.

TEXT.English: You have constructed your first chapel in your colonies.
TEXT.French: Vous venez de fonder votre première chapelle dans vos colonies.
TEXT.German: You have constructed your first chapel in your colonies.
TEXT.Italian: You have constructed your first chapel in your colonies.
TEXT.Spanish: You have constructed your first chapel in your colonies.

TEXT.English: The preachers will help you speed up immigration of units in Europe.
TEXT.French: Les prédicateurs vous permettrons d'accélérer l'immigration d'unités en Europe.
TEXT.German: The preachers will help you speed up immigration of units in Europe.
TEXT.Italian: The preachers will help you speed up immigration of units in Europe.
TEXT.Spanish: The preachers will help you speed up immigration of units in Europe.

TEXT.English: You have constructed your first tavern in your colonies.
TEXT.French: Vous venez de bâtir une taverne dans votre colonie.
TEXT.German: You have constructed your first tavern in your colonies.
TEXT.Italian: Avete costruito la vostra prima taverna nelle vostre colonie.
TEXT.Spanish: You have constructed your first tavern in your colonies.

TEXT.English: The taverns, provided they don't lack rum, often attract a population on the fringes of society.[NEWLINE]You will have criminals ready to commit that will make excellent soldiers, sailors and artillerymen.
TEXT.French: Les tavernes, à condition de ne jamais manquer d'alcool, attirent une population souvent en marge de la bonne société.[NEWLINE]Vous aurez des criminels prêts à s'engager qui feront d'excellents soldats, artilleurs ou marins.
TEXT.German: The taverns, provided they don't lack rum, often attract a population on the fringes of society.[NEWLINE]You will have criminals ready to commit that will make excellent soldiers, sailors and artillerymen.
TEXT.Italian: The taverns, provided they don't lack rum, often attract a population on the fringes of society.[NEWLINE]You will have criminals ready to commit that will make excellent soldiers, sailors and artillerymen.
TEXT.Spanish: The taverns, provided they don't lack rum, often attract a population on the fringes of society.[NEWLINE]You will have criminals ready to commit that will make excellent soldiers, sailors and artillerymen.

TEXT.English: You have constructed your first armoury in your colonies.
TEXT.French: Vous venez de bâtir une armurerie dans votre colonie.
TEXT.German: You have constructed your first armory in your colonies.
TEXT.Italian: You have constructed your first armory in your colonies.
TEXT.Spanish: You have constructed your first armory in your colonies.

TEXT.English: The presence of the armoury allows you to produce swords. You decide the percentage of production of each resource you want by clicking on the "armoury management" in your colony. [NEWLINE]The manufacture of muskets and ammunition requires the construction of a magazine and an arsenal for cannons.
TEXT.French: La présence de l'armurerie vous permet de fabriquer des épées. Il vous appartient de décider le pourcentage de fabrication de chacune des ressources souhaitées en cliquant sur l'icône "gestion de l'armurerie" dans votre colonie.[NEWLINE]La fabrication des mousquets et des munitions requiert la construction d'un magasin et d'un arsenal pour celle des canons.
TEXT.German: The presence of the armory allows you to produce swords. You decide the percentage of production of each resource you want by clicking on the "armory management" in your colony. [NEWLINE]The manufacture of muskets and ammunition requires the construction of a magazine and an arsenal for cannons.
TEXT.Italian: The presence of the armory allows you to produce swords. You decide the percentage of production of each resource you want by clicking on the "armory management" in your colony. [NEWLINE]The manufacture of muskets and ammunition requires the construction of a magazine and an arsenal for cannons.
TEXT.Spanish: The presence of the armory allows you to produce swords. You decide the percentage of production of each resource you want by clicking on the "armory management" in your colony. [NEWLINE]The manufacture of muskets and ammunition requires the construction of a magazine and an arsenal for cannons.

TEXT.English: If you want to found your coastal settlement in this place ... [NEWLINE] Select the landed settler near the ship and click on the icon "Establish a colony".
TEXT.French: Si vous souhaitez fonder votre colonie côtière en ce lieu ...[NEWLINE]Sélectionnez le colon débarqué à proximité du navire et cliquez sur l'icône "Fonder une colonie" dans le Background.
TEXT.German: If you want to found your coastal settlement in this place ... [NEWLINE] Select the landed settler near the ship and click on the icon "Establish a colony".
TEXT.Italian: If you want to found your coastal settlement in this place ... [NEWLINE] Select the landed settler near the ship and click on the icon "Establish a colony".
TEXT.Spanish: If you want to found your coastal settlement in this place ... [NEWLINE] Select the landed settler near the ship and click on the icon "Establish a colony".

TEXT.English: Click this button, to access the "Change Influence Area" window. [NEWLINE] This function allows you to give control of lands within your influence to Indian Tribes and other European Nations. [NEWLINE] The giving of land will be greatly appreciated by your opponents.
TEXT.French: Par ce bouton, vous accéderez à la "Fenêtre de Modification des Zones d'Influence".[NEWLINE]Cette fonction vous autorise à renoncer à l'Influence que vous exercez sur certaines terres et ainsi en donner l'usufruit aux tribus Indiennes comme à d'autres nations Européennes.[NEWLINE]La concession des terres sera considérablement appréciée par vos adversaires.
TEXT.German: Click this button, to access the "Change Influence Area" window. [NEWLINE] This function allows you to give control of lands within your influence to Indian Tribes and other European Nations. [NEWLINE] The giving of land will be greatly appreciated by your opponents.
TEXT.Italian: Click this button, to access the "Change Influence Area" window. [NEWLINE] This function allows you to give control of lands within your influence to Indian Tribes and other European Nations. [NEWLINE] The giving of land will be greatly appreciated by your opponents.
TEXT.Spanish: Click this button, to access the "Change Influence Area" window. [NEWLINE] This function allows you to give control of lands within your influence to Indian Tribes and other European Nations. [NEWLINE] The giving of land will be greatly appreciated by your opponents.

TEXT.English: In wartime, automatic trade can continue. If you think a road is threatened, you can cancel automation for the affected wagon train. [NEWLINE] If you want to stop the automated trade in wartime, you can disable the default choice in the option menu.
TEXT.French: En temps de guerre, les transports automatiques poursuivent leur mission. Si vous jugez qu'une route est menacée, vous devez dévalider le ou les chariots concernés.[NEWLINE]Si vous souhaitez que le transport automatique cesse durant une guerre, vous devez désactiver ce choix par défaut dans le menu option.
TEXT.German: In wartime, automatic trade can continue. If you think a road is threatened, you can cancel automation for the affected wagon train. [NEWLINE] If you want to stop the automated trade in wartime, you can disable the default choice in the option menu.
TEXT.Italian: In wartime, automatic trade can continue. If you think a road is threatened, you can cancel automation for the affected wagon train. [NEWLINE] If you want to stop the automated trade in wartime, you can disable the default choice in the option menu.

TEXT.English: The King grants you a warehouse in Europe which can [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]store %d1 resources.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Congratulations![NEWLINE]In light of your wisdom to carry out a [BOLD]commercial contract[\BOLD] and [BOLD]traded several yields[\BOLD], the King grants you a warehouse in Europe, sure that you will know what to do to benefit your Homeland with this new world wealth.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Your warehouse can contain %d1 resources.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: Félicitation![NEWLINE]Compte tenu de votre sagacité à mener à bien un [BOLD]contrat commercial[\BOLD] and [BOLD]vendu ressources[\BOLD], le Roi vous concède un entrepôt en Europe, certain que vous saurez faire profiter votre Patrie des richesses du nouveau continent.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Votre entrepôt peux contenir %d1 ressources.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: Congratulations![NEWLINE]In light of your wisdom to carry out a [BOLD]commercial contract[\BOLD] and [BOLD]traded several yields[\BOLD], the King grants you a warehouse in Europe, sure that you will know to do benefit your Homeland of the new world wealth.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Your warehouse can contain %d1 resources.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Congratulations![NEWLINE]Your wisdom is confirmed. You have completed %d1 commercial contracts and traded %d2 yields.[NEWLINE]That's why the King grants you a warehouse extension on the docks.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Your warehouse can hold %d3 resources.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: Félicitation![NEWLINE]Votre sagacité se confirme. Vous avez mené à bien %d1 contrats commerciaux et vendu %d2 ressources.[NEWLINE]C'est pour celà que le Roi vous octroie une extension d'entrepôt sur les docks.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Votre entrepôt peux contenir %d3 ressources.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The era 1 formalizes your implantation on the new continent.[NEWLINE]By founding of your first colony, you'll have access to a wealth of buildings and allow immigrations to your colonies.Only the port colonies are allowed during this era. The exchanges with the native villages will be flourishing and you can cultivate the seedlings in order to make trade with Europe.[NEWLINE]Found your colonies where the crops will be the most productive and adapted. The good relations with the indigenous nations will enable you to make solid allies in case of war. But you will have to fear the first attacks by pirates.
TEXT.French: L'ère 1 officialise votre implantation sur le nouveau continent.[NEWLINE]En fondant votre première colonie, vous accéderez à une foule de bâtiments et permettrez l'immigration vers vos colonies. Seules les colonies portuaires sont autorisées durant cette ère.[NEWLINE]Les échanges avec les villages indigènes seront florissants et vous pourrez, par la suite, cultiver les plants que vous aurez obtenus afin d'en faire commerce avec l'Europe.[NEWLINE]Fondez vos colonies là où les cultures seront les plus productives et les plus adaptées.[NEWLINE]Les bonnes relations avec les nations indigènes vous permettront d'en faire de solides alliés en cas de guerre. Vous aurez cependant à craindre les premières attaques de la part des pirates.
TEXT.German: The era 1 formalizes your implantation on the new continent.[NEWLINE]By founding of your first colony, you'll have access to a wealth of buildings and allow immigrations to your colonies.Only the port colonies are allowed during this era. The exchanges with the native villages will be flourishing and you can cultivate the seedlings in order to make trade with Europe.[NEWLINE]Found your colonies where the crops will be the most productive and adapted. The good relations with the indigenous nations will enable you to make solid allies in case of war. But you will have to fear the first attacks by pirates.

The good relations with the indigenous nations will enable you to make solid allies in case of war. But you will have to fear the first attacks by pirates.

The exchanges with the native villages will be flourishing and you can cultivate the seedlings in order to make trade with Europe.[NEWLINE]Found your colonies where the crops will be the most productive and adapted. The good relations with the indigenous nations will enable you to make solid allies in case of war. But you will have to fear the first attacks by pirates.

TEXT.English: The era 2 will bring you many improvements; it is capital to do your best to have this era before your opponents.[NEWLINE]In addition to being able to access the developments of buildings, military units are more powerful and will give you the advantage in case of conflict.[NEWLINE]The pirates will invade the seas and threaten your trade routes.[NEWLINE]The colonies within the land are now allowed and will allow you to consider a colonization in depth while controlling your areas of influence.
TEXT.French: L'ère 2 vous apportera de nombreuses améliorations ; il est capital d'ambitionner, le plus rapidement possible, le passage à cette ère avant que vos adversaires y parviennent.[NEWLINE]Outre le fait de pouvoir accéder à des évolutions de bâtiments, les unités militaires sont plus puissantes et vous donneront l'avantage en cas de conflit.[NEWLINE]Les pirates envahiront les mers et menaceront vos routes commerciales.[NEWLINE]Les colonies à l'intérieur des terres sont dorénavant autorisées et vous permettront d'envisager une colonisation en profondeur tout en contrôlant vos zones d'influence.
TEXT.German: The era 2 will bring you many improvements; it is capital to do your best to have this era before your opponents.[NEWLINE]In addition to being able to access the developments of buildings, military units are more powerful and will give you the advantage in case of conflict.[NEWLINE]The pirates will invade the seas and threaten your trade routes.[NEWLINE]The colonies within the land are now allowed and will allow you to consider a colonization in depth while controlling your areas of influence.
TEXT.Italian: The era 2 will bring you many improvements; it is capital to do your best to have this era before your opponents.[NEWLINE]In addition to being able to access the developments of buildings, military units are more powerful and will give you the advantage in case of conflict.[NEWLINE]The pirates will invade the seas and threaten your trade routes.[NEWLINE]The colonies within the land are now allowed and will allow you to consider a colonization in depth while controlling your areas of influence.
TEXT.Spanish: The era 2 will bring you many improvements; it is capital to do your best to have this era before your opponents.[NEWLINE]In addition to being able to access the developments of buildings, military units are more powerful and will give you the advantage in case of conflict.[NEWLINE]The pirates will invade the seas and threaten your trade routes.[NEWLINE]The colonies within the land are now allowed and will allow you to consider a colonization in depth while controlling your areas of influence.

TEXT.English: The era 3 offers new developments of buildings and a fire power increased for military units land and naval.[NEWLINE]The natives nations represent no more than a threat insignificant, thereby freeing your territorial ambitions.[NEWLINE]Your naval forces will finally be able to eradicate the pirates of the seas and will deliver your agricultural production which will reach record highs.[NEWLINE]You must demonstrate your ability to establish and manage multiple colonies. Further increase your agricultural production to establish a naval and land supremacy only able to control world trade.
TEXT.French: L'ère 3 offre de nouvelles évolutions de bâtiments et une puissance de feu accrue pour les unités militaires terrestres et navales.[NEWLINE]Les nations indigènes ne représenteront plus qu'une menace insignifiante, libérant ainsi vos ambitions territoriales.[NEWLINE]Vos forces navales seront enfin en mesure d'éradiquer les pirates des mers et permettra de livrer votre production agricole qui atteindra des records.[NEWLINE]Grâce à une économie prospère, cette ère sera aussi celle qui vous permettra d'envisager une guerre d'indépendance et de combattre le roi jusqu'à la victoire.
TEXT.German: The era 3 offers new developments of buildings and a fire power increased for military units land and naval.[NEWLINE]The natives nations represent no more than a threat insignificant, thereby freeing your territorial ambitions.[NEWLINE]Your naval forces will finally be able to eradicate the pirates of the seas and will deliver your agricultural production which will reach record highs.[NEWLINE]You must demonstrate your ability to establish and manage multiple colonies. Further increase your agricultural production to establish a naval and land supremacy only able to control world trade.

Further increase your agricultural production to establish a naval and land supremacy only able to control world trade.

Further increase your agricultural production to establish a naval and land supremacy only able to control world trade.

TEXT.English: The Era 4 opens the door to new perspectives. King no longer serves you except to give you orders and collect taxes.[NEWLINE]Settlers and notables, of colonies that you administer, dispute mainly the king's right to impose its will.[NEWLINE]It is your responsibility to embark on a war of independence against your homeland and fight the king to victory.
TEXT.French: L'ère 4 vous ouvre la voie vers de nouvelles perspectives. Le roi ne vous sert plus à rien sinon de vous ordonner ses conditions et percevoir ses impôts.[NEWLINE]Les colons et les notables, des colonies que vous administrez, contestent majoritairement le droit du roi à imposer sa volonté.[NEWLINE]Il vous appartiendra de vous lancer dans une guerre d'indépendance contre votre mère patrie et de combattre le roi jusqu'à la victoire.
TEXT.German: The Era 4 opens the door to new perspectives. King no longer serves you except to give you orders and collect taxes.[NEWLINE]Settlers and notables, of colonies that you administer, dispute mainly the king's right to impose its will.[NEWLINE]It is your responsibility to embark on a war of independence against your homeland and fight the king to victory.

TEXT.English: These devils Pirates !!! Fight them at all costs.[NEWLINE]I deliver you this %s1 to put an end to this mess.

TEXT.English: The unbearable attacks are ruining our profits. [NEWLINE]Engage this %s1 that I commend you and make sure to clean seas.
